Name: connamespace
Description: The OID of the namespace that contains this\n constraint

Name: contype
Description: c = check constraint,\n f = foreign key constraint, p = primary key constraint, u = unique constraint

Name: condeferred
Description: Is the constraint deferred by default?

Name: conrelid
Description: The table this constraint is on; 0 if not a table\n constraint

Name: contypid
Description: The domain this constraint is on; 0 if not a domain\n constraint

Name: confrelid
Description: If a foreign key, the referenced table; else 0

Name: conkey
Description: If a table constraint, list of columns which the\n constraint constrains

Name: confkey
Description: If a foreign key, list of the referenced columns

Name: conpfeqop
Description: If a foreign key, list of the equality operators for\n PK = FK comparisons

Name: conppeqop
Description: If a foreign key, list of the equality operators for\n PK = PK comparisons

Name: conffeqop
Description: If a foreign key, list of the equality operators for\n FK = FK comparisons

Name: conbin
Description: If a check constraint, an internal representation of\n the expression

Name: consrc
Description: If a check constraint, a human-readable\n representation of the expression
